People's reporter

In today's world, every resident can take something exciting and make it public. Often, readers themselves write such an interesting or learning story that a professional reporter will only be jealous. You want to feel like a journalist, write not just for your friends on social media? Maybe get a special prize like the best. National Reporter!

There's a special shirt on the TVTVER.ru site.National Reporter♪ It is you that can lead it by building new and exciting developments from the city and our region. Just add the photos, videos and stories you've seen. In doing so, it was very simple to write a publication on the website: register, enter a private office in the section of the publication, and just start presenting your thoughts. Add the images and video files you need, press! Our editor will see your material as soon as possible, if necessary, slightly adjust the technical details of the publication and add the right tags. Theories are keywords describing the content of your record and making it easier to look for, for example, People's Reporter, TWT, News, Tver.

Another editorial click and your publication is posted on the leading information portal of the Tower region.

Of course, users must not violate the law of the Russian Federation andinformation portal rules♪
